plumb.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to succeed in understanding something completely
plumb.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Psychologists try to plumb the deepest mysteries of the human psyche.
plumb.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The bullet hit him plumb between the eyes.
plumb.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The whole idea sounds plumb crazy to me.
